addVerifier(address).details: Verifier can add master address or remove addresses added by it

initialize(address).details: Contract follows proxy pattern and this function is used to initialize the variables for the contract in the proxy

params._admin: Admin of the verification contract who can add verifiers and remove masterAddresses deemed invalid

params._user: address which has to be checked if mapped against a verified master address
params._verifier: verifier with which master address has to be verified

linkAddress(bytes).details: Master address to which the address is being linked need not be verified

params._approval: Signature made by the master address to link the address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerMasterAddress(address,bool).details: Multiple accounts can be linked to master address to act on behalf. Master address can be registered by multiple verifiers

params._isMasterLinked: boolean which specifies if the masterAddress has to be added as a linked address
params._masterAddress: address which is registered as verified

removeVerifier(address).details: Verifier can add master address or remove addresses added by it

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlinkAddress(address).details: a single address can be linked to only one master address

unregisterMasterAddress(address,address).details: unregistering master address doesn't affect linked addreses mapping to master address, though they would not be verified by this verifier anymore

params._verifier: verifier address from which master address is unregistered

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the variables of the contract

isUser(address,address).notice: User to verify if an address is linked to a master address that is registered with verifier

linkAddress(bytes).notice: Link an address with a master address

registerMasterAddress(address,bool).notice: Only verifier can add register master address

unregisterMasterAddress(address,address).notice: Master address can be unregistered by registered verifier or owner
